snippet: When an abdominal injury sent Austin Jackson to the disabled list in May, the Tigers called up Quintin Berry, who has held his own ever since, hitting .285 with a .365 on-base percentage through Friday.
abstract: When an abdominal injury sent Austin Jackson to the disabled list in May, the Tigers called up Quintin Berry, who has held his own ever since, hitting .285 with a .365 on-base percentage through Friday.

headline.main: Speedster's Late Arrival to the Tigers
